Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
cooldown=2 longestholdtime=12 spawndistance=61.8 spawnheight=15
check=true down=false equipped=false debris=game:GetService("Debris")
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do a.ChildAdded:wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
local effectpart=waitfor(sp.Handle,"EffectPart") local waveanimation=waitfor(sp,"WaveAnim")
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse~=nil then equipped=true mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if mouse~=nil and check then check=false down=true mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if h~=nil and h.Health>0 and t~=nil then waveAnim=h:LoadAnimation(waveanimation) if waveAnim then waveAnim:Play(nil,nil,.3) end local spawnlocation=mouse.Hit.p if (spawnlocation-t.Position).magnitude>spawndistance then spawnlocation=t.Position+(mouse.Hit.p-t.Position).unit*spawndistance end spawnlocation=spawnlocation+Vector3.new(0,spawnheight,0) local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Boulder" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Brown") p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.Anchored=false p.CanCollide=true p.Locked=true p.Shape="Ball" p.Size=Vector3.new(4,4,4) p.Elasticity=0 p.Friction=1 p.CFrame=CFrame.new(spawnlocation)
local p2=Instance.new("Part") --this part makes sure it stays lumpy and doesn't roll like a ball. p2.Name="Boulder" p2.FormFactor="Custom" p2.Size=Vector3.new(3,3,3) p2.BrickColor=p.BrickColor p2.Transparency=1 p2.TopSurface="Smooth" p2.BottomSurface="Smooth" p2.CanCollide=true p2.Anchored=false p2.Locked=true p2.Elasticity=0 p2.Friction=1 local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0=p w.Part1=p2 w.C0=CFrame.Angles(math.random()*math.pi*2,math.random()*math.pi*2,math.random()*math.pi*2) w.Parent=p2 debris:AddItem(p2,30) p2.Parent=p
local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1290033" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102542003" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*2.4 m.VertexColor=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*1.5 m.Parent=p
local sound1=Instance.new("Sound") sound1.Name="RockSound" sound1.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102544922" sound1.Volume=1 sound1.Looped=false sound1.PlayOnRemove=false sound1.Parent=p
local sound2=Instance.new("Sound") sound2.Name="DirtSound" sound2.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102546080" sound2.Volume=.7 sound2.Looped=true sound2.PlayOnRemove=false sound2.Parent=p
local bp=Instance.new("BodyPosition") bp.maxForce=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*10^6 bp.position=spawnlocation bp.Parent=p
local bav=Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bav.maxTorque=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*10^6 bav.angularvelocity=Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*3 bav.Parent=p
local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Name="creator" ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Parent=p
local dt=Instance.new("IntValue") dt.Name="DamageTag" dt.Value=12 dt.Parent=p
debris:AddItem(p,20) p.Parent=game.Workspace attachmentparts={} for i=1,5 do --this was supposed to make it look like the rock was gaining mass, but turned out looking like some basic dust effect. :( local ap=Instance.new("Part") ap.Name="Effect" ap.FormFactor="Custom" ap.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) ap.Transparency=1 ap.TopSurface="Smooth" ap.BottomSurface="Smooth" ap.CanCollide=false ap.Anchored=false ap.Locked=true local smoke=Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Opacity=.1 smoke.Color=p.BrickColor.Color smoke.RiseVelocity=2.5 smoke.Size=.1 smoke.Parent=ap local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0=p w.Part1=ap w.C0=CFrame.Angles(math.random()*math.pi*2,math.random()*math.pi*2,math.random()*math.pi*2)*CFrame.new(0,-15,0) w.Parent=ap table.insert(attachmentparts,ap) debris:AddItem(ap,20) ap.Parent=p end starttime=tick() delay(.25,function() if sound2~=nil then sound2:Play() end end) while down and equipped and tick()-starttime<longestholdtime do local percent=(tick()-starttime)/longestholdtime if bav~=nil then bav.angularvelocity=bav.angularvelocity+(Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*.5) end local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if mouse~=nil and h~=nil and h.Health>0 and t~=nil then if bp~=nil then local spawnlocation=mouse.Hit.p if (spawnlocation-t.Position).magnitude>spawndistance then spawnlocation=t.Position+(mouse.Hit.p-t.Position).unit*spawndistance end spawnlocation=spawnlocation+Vector3.new(0,spawnheight,0)+(Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*percent*5) bp.position=spawnlocation end else break end wait(.06) end
if bp~=nil then bp:remove() end if bav~=nil then bav:remove() end local percent=(tick()-starttime)/longestholdtime if p~=nil then p.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,-100*percent,0) local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=p s.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(p,6) end if dt~=nil then dt.Value=12+56*percent end if waveAnim then waveAnim:Stop() end wait(1) if attachmentparts then for _,v in pairs(attachmentparts) do debris:AddItem(v,3) local smoke=v:FindFirstChild("Smoke") if smoke~=nil then smoke.Enabled=false end end end wait(cooldown) if mouse~=nil then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end end check=true end end) mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() down=false end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false if waveAnim then waveAnim:Stop() end end
sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
debris=game:GetService("Debris")
exploded=false
function bang(hit) if hit~=nil and hit.Name~="Effect" and hit.Name~="Handle" then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then local ct=sp:FindFirstChild("creator") local dt=sp:FindFirstChild("DamageTag") if ct~=nil and dt~=nil and ((not game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)) or game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)~=ct.Value) then for _,v in pairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v~=nil and v.className=="ObjectValue" then v:remove() end end ct:clone().Parent=h h:TakeDamage(dt.Value) dt.Value=dt.Value*.5 end end if not exploded then local s=sp:FindFirstChild("RockSound") if s~=nil then s:play() end local s2=sp:FindFirstChild("DirtSound") if s2~=nil then s2:stop() end exploded=true for i=1,math.random(8,16) do local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="rock" p.FormFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(math.random(5,20),math.random(5,20),math.random(5,20))*.1 p.LeftSurface="Universal" p.RightSurface="Universal" p.FrontSurface="Universal" p.BackSurface="Universal" p.Anchored=false if math.random()<.5 then p.CanCollide=false end p.Locked=true p.BrickColor=sp.BrickColor local rp=Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5) p.CFrame=sp.CFrame*CFrame.new(rp*8)*CFrame.Angles(math.random()*6,math.random()*6,math.random()*6) p.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,30+(math.random()*30),0)+(rp*math.random(10,40)) p.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*10 debris:AddItem(p,2+(math.random()*4)) p.Parent=game.Workspace end end end end
sp.Touched:connect(bang)
while sp:FindFirstChild("Boulder")==nil do wait() end
sp:FindFirstChild("Boulder").Touched:connect(bang)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do a.ChildAdded:wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
local storeweld=waitfor(sp,"StoreWeld")
sp.Equipped:connect(function() if storeweld then storeweld.Parent=sp end end)
storeweld.Parent=sp
while true do local t1,t2=wait(1/30) storeweld.C0=CFrame.new(0,2.6+(math.sin(t2*.5)*.15),0)*CFrame.Angles(0,t2%(math.pi*2),0) end
